thread.title: BRIEF-Ivanhoe Mines - Legal Actions Initiated Against 2 Mining Cos In 2 Disputes In Democratic Republic Of Congo In Past Week Have "No Connection" With Co

title: BRIEF-Ivanhoe Mines - Legal Actions Initiated Against 2 Mining Cos In 2 Disputes In Democratic Republic Of Congo In Past Week Have "No Connection" With Co
text:
Market News 45 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Ivanhoe Mines - Legal Actions Initiated Against 2 Mining Cos In 2 Disputes In Democratic Republic Of Congo In Past Week Have "No Connection" With Co Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 30 (Reuters) - Ivanhoe Mines Ltd:
* IVANHOE MINES - LEGAL ACTIONS INITIATED AGAINST 2 MINING COS IN 2 DISPUTES IN DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF CONGO IN PAST WEEK HAVE “NO CONNECTION” WITH CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
